org.modelio.gproject.data.project

Class ProjectDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.gproject.data.project.ProjectDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class ProjectDescriptor
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Descriptor of a GProject.

    Descriptors can be created either by reading from a file with ProjectDescriptorReader.read(Path, DefinitionScope), or by creating an empty one with createEmpty(String, Path).

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • serialVersionUID

        public static final long serialVersionUID
        Project descriptor format version.

        History:

        • 1 : initial version
        • 2 : fragments and module paths are now URI relative to the project or absolute.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Instantiate an empty project descriptor.

    • Method Detail

      • createEmpty

        public static ProjectDescriptor createEmpty(String projectName,
                            Path projectPath)
        Create an empty local project descriptor.

        Authorization data is set to none.

        Parameters:
        projectName - the project name.
        projectPath - the project path.
        Returns:
        the new project descriptor.

      • getType

        public String getType()
        Get the project type as a string.

        The string value should match one of the ProjectType enumeration values.

        Returns:
        the project type.

        public void setPath(Path projectPath)
        Set the project path.
        Parameters:
        projectPath - the project path, or null for the default path.

      • setProperties

        public void setProperties(GProperties gProperties)
        Set the project properties.

        Since Modelio 3.2 properties are initialized to an empty GProperties, you don't need to set one.

        Parameters:
        gProperties - the project properties.

        Remove incomplete module and fragment descriptors.
        Returns:
        A report of all incomplete descriptors that were deleted.
